title: 23. "I Said What I Said"  You are Not Responsible for Other People's Feelings
itunes:title: 23. "I Said What I Said"  You are Not Responsible for Other People's Feelings
description:
Hey Girl Hey!

 

This week's topic is the importance of understanding why you are not responsible for other people's feelings,  understanding how to navigate people who make you feel guilty for the way they feel and/or stonewall or give you the silent treatment, and much more!

 

Head on over here to my website (www.beatricekamau.com if the link is not clickable for you) to get your FREE downloadable PDF guide on the 5 Daily Tips on How to Stop Caring What Other People Think.

 

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
